Package model

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    In the Photo model class we can 1. Add/Edit/Delete and get Tags 2. set and get Captions 3. get the date of the Image
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
